nodes.text: Kaminne Sihn was a female Dathomiri Witch and chief of the Raining Leaves Clan as of 43.5 ABY. Around this time, she led her Clan during its conclave with Tasander Dest's Broken Columns Clan. With the help of the Jedi Luke Skywalker and Ben Skywalker and the Sith apprentice Vestara Khai, as well as other off-worlders, the two clans fought off attacks by Nightsisters and successfully merged into one new clan, Bright Sun Clan, headed by the newly wedded Sihn and Dest. They then fought off the Nightsisters one final time.
